content: 9/25 update covalence is featured on lime and violet 1 and one pretty thing s daily diy 2 check out re-yarn com 3 for the fabulous smooshy colorways to make this scarf one skein only or just buy any really rocking handspun bulky yarn from etsy 4 pattern for free on knittyprofessors 5 a note from katie rose please email me if you find any errors with the pattern i ll revise it and send out a free update thanks 1 http //www limenviolet com/blog/ p=4505 2 http //www oneprettything com/ p=708 3 http //re-yarn com 4 http //www etsy com 5 http //knittyprofessors blogspot com
